attributes.title: This is the worst app
attributes.review:
It took a few months to download this.
When I downloaded it all it said error :platypus 
I don’t know why but now I feel like I’m being followed by perry the platypus. I’ve seen him just about everywhere. Is anyone else being stalked?

attributes.title: Trump 😁😁😁
attributes.review: Ok so i dont like the app but trump you are looking a little orange but my mom is good with foundation and i think she can get you a good shade i hope you are doing well and im sorry if my first review mad you angry but i hope you have a blessed day and i hope barron and your wife are doing well 😁

attributes.title: Hehe
attributes.review: This is the worst app ever trump is the worst president ever he destroyed our world he is racist the turns people into animals!!! Y’all need to kick him out of the chair because he is Making the world horrible he let the virus out the let the Japan killer hornets out HE IS NOT GIVING THE BLACKS THEIR TAX MONEY please DELETE this app of of the App Store BECAUSE HE WILL TURN YOU CRAZY!!!!

attributes.title: Worst app ever
attributes.review: I’m going to tell you about how bad this app is!!!!! Uggghhhh I’m so upset. It took forever to load anything and everything. And the words where sooo small! Also it uses up so much data like just eats it up. Oh I found out it plants spy stuff in your phone Soo for your safety DO NOT GET THIS APP!!! A

attributes.title: Russian spyware.
attributes.review: Shortly after downloading this app I received ads for things that I had google searched. Ads for things that I hadn’t even google searched. This app is spying on me and stealing my identity and selling it to the highest bidder so that way I can be marketed to. I don’t trust the ethics of this app it’s very borderline illegal.

attributes.title: This app is horrible
attributes.review: This app puts such a false light on who the president is and what he has done. Of course it’s a political campaign however the negative out ways the positive and they know that. Trump is one of the worst presidents, actively hurting his citizens and declaring war if he loses. He’s the one that should be investigated.

attributes.title: Oh no
attributes.review: I’m sorry when I downloaded this app I bunch of eggs got thrown at my house. I wondered why. Until I saw government agents at my house THROWING EGGS. On top of that oranges started getting thrown at my house. It broke 2 of my windows. Honestly the app itself didn’t even work. Horrible do not recommend! 1 star

attributes.title: This app gave my phone a virus
attributes.review: I just downloaded the Trump 2020 app, and my phone started glitching, it started with a muffled sound coming out of my speakers, then my phone screen started glitching out in black lines. DELETE THIS APP FROM YOUR PHONE, NOT ONLY CAN THEY HACK YOUR INFORMATION THEY CAN ALSO TRACK WHERE U GO. DELETE DELETE DELETE!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!

attributes.title: I don’t like it
attributes.review: You know this app still doesn’t give me a reason to vote for this man Donald Trump it’s a horrible app like people said it takes too long to download it bugs out sometimes and kicks me out the app is too buggy it’s just horrible.

attributes.title: Sold my bank info!
attributes.review:
I downloaded this app and registered for an account. Not two minutes later I was notified by my bank that someone else had accessed my information. They took everything!!!!

Total spyware!
